name: Missing Arrows
description:
A simple, somewhat goofy, 2D side scroller. You control the player who is an archer. You start the game with a bow but no arrows, so you must kill enemies that happen to drop the components you need to craft arrows for your bow. Your mission is to defeat your arch nemesis The Boss. The Boss is unfazed by head bounces, but fortunately, during his fits of rage, he throws bad guys at you that just so happen to drop ingredients for your arrows when they die. Once you craft your arrows, you can shoot The Boss with them to defeat him. If you're running low on health, shoot chickens with your bow and arrows and they will drop a chicken leg that you can eat and regain some health.

This game is my submission for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #16.
